install.name: Background
install.author: Koen Bijleveld
install.description:
This module allows you to configure a static or random background image on your website. It generates CSS code in your template.

Features:

  • Use a configurable color
  • Choose a static background image
  • Use a random background image
  • Use additional CSS styles

Instructions:

Put the module where you want in the template. But after the CSS reference line.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: color
param.label: Background color
param.description: Choose the background color, Eg. #000000 (Leave blank for #ffffff).

param.name: image
param.label: Background image
param.description: Select a static background image from the images/stories directory.

param.name: random
param.label: Choose random image
param.description: Use a random background image from the directory below.

param.name: folder
param.label: Images directory
param.description: Specify the images directory (Leave blank for /images/stories).

param.name: additional_css
param.label: Additional CSS
param.description: Specify additional CSS styles for your body class. Use a semicolon to seperate lines.
